A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So poorly written and acted that I started rooting for the empire.  just wanted it to end already.  this is the last star wars movie i will ever sit though.  Almost nothing in the this movie makes sense.  A US Navy Nimitz-class aircraft carrier can go nearly a quarter century without needing fuel\, but the main plot point of this movie is that the rebel ships are running out of fuel?  What\, they need a petrol station?  Do they run on diesel?  Everything about this script is lazy.  It's like the plot of a B rated video game.
